mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SC_ISO_AUTH_COMPANY_ITEM(COM_CODE, AUTH_TYPE, AUTH_CODE, AUTH_DATE, EXP_DATE, REG_INPUT_DATE, REG_DW_USER_IDX, UP_DW_USER_IDX, REG_DATE, UP_DATE, ITEM_STATE, FILE_NAME, FILE_PATH) VALUES (#{COM_CODE}, #{AUTH_TYPE}, #{AUTH_CODE}, #{AUTH_DATE}, #{EXP_DATE}, #{REG_INPUT_DATE}, #{REG_DW_USER_IDX}, #{UP_DW_USER_IDX}, sysdate, sysdate, #{ITEM_STATE}, #{FILE_NAME}, #{FILE_PATH})
mapper.update: UPDATE SC_ISO_AUTH_COMPANY_ITEM SET ITEM_STATE=#{ITEM_STATE}, AUTH_DATE=#{AUTH_DATE}, EXP_DATE=#{EXP_DATE}, REG_INPUT_DATE=#{REG_INPUT_DATE}, FILE_NAME=#{FILE_NAME}, FILE_PATH=#{FILE_PATH}, UP_DW_USER_IDX = #{UP_DW_USER_IDX}, UP_DATE = sysdate WHERE COM_CODE=#{COM_CODE} AND AUTH_CODE=#{AUTH_CODE}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) from SC_ISO_AUTH_COMPANY_ITEM where AUTH_CODE=#{AUTH_CODE} and COM_CODE=#{COM_CODE}
select * from SC_ISO_AUTH_COMPANY_ITEM where AUTH_CODE=#{AUTH_CODE} and COM_CODE=#{COM_CODE}

SELECT ACI.COM_CODE, CC.COM_NAME, AUTH_TYPE, APPROVE_STATE, APPROVE_DATE, POINT FROM SC_AUTH_COMPANY_INFO ACI INNER JOIN SC_COMPANY_CODE CC ON CC.COM_CODE = ACI.COM_CODE WHERE AUTH_TYPE=#{AUTH_TYPE} and ACI.COM_CODE=#{COM_CODE}

SELECT RN, COM_CODE, COM_NAME, AUTH_TYPE, APPROVE_STATE, TO_CHAR(APPROVE_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS APPROVE_DATE, POINT FROM ( SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(SC_ISO_AUTH_COMPANY_ITEM PK_ISO_AUTH_COMPANY_ITEM) */ ROWNUM RN, ACI.COM_CODE, CC.COM_NAME, AUTH_TYPE, APPROVE_STATE, APPROVE_DATE, POINT FROM SC_AUTH_COMPANY_INFO ACI INNER JOIN SC_COMPANY_CODE CC ON CC.COM_CODE = ACI.COM_CODE WHERE 1 =1
AND (ACI.COM_CODE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{COM_CODE}), '%'))
AND (CC.COM_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{COM_NAME}), '%'))
AND (ACI.APPROVE_STATE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{COM_STATUS}), '%'))
AND (ACI.AUTH_TYPE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{AUTH_TYPE}), '%'))
AND ROWNUM <= (#{criteria.pageNum} * #{criteria.amount})
) WHERE RN > ((#{criteria.pageNum}-1) * #{criteria.amount})
